website_summaries.verdict: This sheet fits some high-end bassinets and Moses baskets for half the price of branded sheets.
pros: Measures 30" x 18" x 2".100% certified organic cotton jersey
cons: Sometimes shrinks even when following care directions, so dry with caution

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Guava Family Lotus Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in hopes they would fit our Guava Family Lotus Bassinet. They fit perfectly, even better than the Lotus Bassinet Sheets! And I did not notice any shrinkage after being washed and dried. Love the quality, softness and price when compared to the price of the Lotus sheets. I completely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa Lopez

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Guava Lotus Bassinet Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I purchased the Guava Lotus Bassinet and Crib for our baby as we are in the process of trying to move and wanted something compact and easy to travel with (as opposed to a a traditional crib). The fitted sheets for sale on the Guava Family website were 1)Way too expensive and 2)Unavailable for purchase for a long time. After seeing a review on another Kushies Organic Jersey Sheet Set, I decided to purchase this because I wanted sheets in a slightly darker color. This fits the bassinet mattress PERFECTLY and is so soft! It also helps that it's about half the price of the organic sheets on the Guava Family website. Definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: JVR

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for Guava Lotus bassinet
customer_reviews.text: We needed extra bassinet sheets for our Guava Lotus bassinet and these fit perfectly. The gray color matched perfectly with the Lotus fabric, and the fit was spot on, too. The material is soft and the price was reasonable. Would highly recommend for the Lotus bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Moy

customer_reviews.title: Used for Guava Family Lotus bassinet.
customer_reviews.text: Soft, washed well - but did shrink a little. Fits my Guava Family Lotus bassinet mattress just fine, but after washing I did have to spend a few minutes stretching it out for a better fit around all of the edges. But it fits and I'm not worried about it coming loose. I just could not justify $30 for the organic bassinet sheet that Guava Family sells on their site.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's a great sheet yet cost a lot more
customer_reviews.text: I wish I had found out about these sooner. I ordered the organic bassinet sheet from guava family for our lotus bassinet. It's a great sheet yet cost a lot more. I wanted extra sheets but didn't want to pay another $30 for the sheet. I saw another reviewer had purchased the same sheet for the lotus bassinet so I decided to give it a try. The pockets for the kushies are not as deep as the lotus ones and the material is a little less soft, but for the price it works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Melbry

customer_reviews.title: FIts the GUAVA bassinet perfectly
customer_reviews.text: I struggled this past week to find a bassinet sheet that would fit the Guava bassinet. This sheet fits perfectly! Thank you to the other reviewers who left that feedback that this sheet would work. The only difference between the color grey I bought is that it is a little bit more "taupe" colored than grey. You could consider it a warm grey versus a cool grey. Hands down, I'll be buying more of these for my baby's bassinet!
customer_reviews.author: Christina J.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for the Graco travel crib. This is a great find since Graco does not seem to make any sheets to fit the travel cribs. This sheet comes in a little pouch so you can pack it up in your suitcase. Very helpful
customer_reviews.author: teedah

customer_reviews.title: Fits guava lotus bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I had a hard time finding sheets that fit the guava lotus bassinet. These ones worked great! Nice and snug around the mattress, but not too tight to make the mattress bend. I purchased 2, just in case one was in the wash, which I recommend to do ( hate laundry with a passion). The material is soft and stays soft through washes. I do wish the sheet was a little thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Zq

customer_reviews.title: but it got the job done and was a good price.
customer_reviews.text: This sheet was soft, and fit well over the little mat that comes with the "Summer Infant Cosleeper." I'm not sure if it was "proper" sleep regulations to use this on that, but he mostly slept in there while we were awake anyways. It's just plain beige, nothing particularly "cute" about it, but it got the job done and was a good price.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is very soft. However, it does not fit my bassinet mattress. I was very diligent on doing research before ordering. Unfortunately, almost all sheets on the market state “fits most bassinet mattresses”. But, after reading reviews and seeing the robo-response from the company over and over that it would fit most, I decided to try it. It’s too small and buckles the mattress when on, so we won’t be able to use it. I have the Simmons Kids Deluxe Gliding Bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Chad

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Organic soft cotton in a beautiful color. Fitted perfectly on our stroller mattress!
customer_reviews.author: EF

customer_reviews.title: Fits the Guava Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: I love that this fits my Guava Family Bassinet mattress. It is soft and breathable.
customer_reviews.author: Rora

customer_reviews.title: Good stuff
customer_reviews.text: Works well on baby bjorn bassinet. We air dried a few times but it stretched so now we put through dryer and they fit really well, very snug.
customer_reviews.author: D Z

customer_reviews.title: Well made, soft, and fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: This fit our Guava bassinet mattress perfectly and was less expensive than the sheet that can be ordered from Guava. The sheet is soft and well made.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Fits Baby Bjorn Bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sheets and will fit BabyBjorn bassinet. Can’t wait to use them! Hoping that they hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: NL

customer_reviews.title: Simple. Soft. Fits Lotus Guava.
customer_reviews.text: This bassinet sheet is one of the only ones that would fit my lotus guava bassinet. I don’t think you really need anything fancy and it does the job!
customer_reviews.author: Doan Phan

customer_reviews.title: It's a far better price than the Guava Family sheets and washes well
customer_reviews.text: I use this on the Guava Family bassinet and it is soft and fits perfectly! It's a far better price than the Guava Family sheets and washes well. I highly recommend these sheets!
customer_reviews.author: KP

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality sheets for the price
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality sheets for the price. I've been using my grandfather's bassinet that he slept in when he was a baby and it only fits oval mattresses. I was concerned about these sheets not fitting correctly, but they fit great. They're soft and cushy and have held up well in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Speights

customer_reviews.title: Bassinet sheets
customer_reviews.text: Fits Graco travel bassinet!! I've been using these sheets for 3 months and I love them.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew & Jenea

customer_reviews.title: Was expecting better quality. Also the instructions asked to wash before ...
customer_reviews.text: Was expecting better quality. Also the instructions asked to wash before use, and it caused the fabric to loose further softness. Not entirely happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon User 998701

customer_reviews.title: Fits both of my bassinets
customer_reviews.text: Soft. This fit my Britax Bassinet as well as my Naturepedic bassinet mattress.
customer_reviews.author: mommyof3

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Fit the Guava Lotus bassinet perfectly. Very happy with this.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Carter

customer_reviews.title: The sheet is super soft but it shrunk when I washed it
customer_reviews.text: The sheet is super soft but it shrunk when I washed it. Baby hasn't transitioned to the bassinet yet and I am guessing he will flatten back out the mattress but it did curl the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: C. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Yes the sheets themselves are very soft and great quality, but the company needs to be very ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure which bassinet this company thinks these sheets fit, but it definitely wasn't mine. Most of the reviews spoke about these sheets shrinking and those reviews are 100% accurate. Yes the sheets themselves are very soft and great quality, but the company needs to be very specific on what type of bassinet mattress they fit. Overall I am very disappointed with these sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Lana Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Fits Travel Lite Pack n Play
customer_reviews.text: Really soft. Bought for my Graco Pack n Play travel lite bassinet and the sheet fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D

customer_reviews.title: Tiny after wash
customer_reviews.text: I got these for the TravelLite Graco crib mattress. After I washed the sheet, it became tiny! The sheet didn't fit the little mattress at all. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Lena

customer_reviews.title: Fits Lotus
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey for 1 small sheet, but a perfect fit for Lotus bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: ok subsitute for Guava Family Lotus bassinet mattress
customer_reviews.text: does fit Guava Family Lotus bassinet mattress, not perfect but can tuck in sides a bit and keep sheet taut
customer_reviews.author: moosehouse

customer_reviews.title: a little biggish
customer_reviews.text: it's ok, nothing special. Quite big, too big for the moses basket, but good for other basinet we have
customer_reviews.author: glatocha

customer_reviews.title: Great quality & perfect fit
customer_reviews.text: This is very soft cotton! Great quality & perfect fit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Lotus Guava Crib--- soft and great price
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit for our Lotus guava crib. It's also like 1/3 of the price and ten times softer than the Lotus sheets offered by the company.
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Fits Summer Bentwood bassinet
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased. Incredibly soft and most importantly fits my Summer Bentwood Bassinet!
customer_reviews.author: LB+6

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: A little looser than I'd like for my Babybjorn cradle, but still a great quality sheet.
customer_reviews.author: Isabelle S.

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: Love these fitted sheets, soft, organic, wash well, I am using them on the baby bjorn cradle and they fit well.
customer_reviews.author: Talb100

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit for the BabyBjorn cradle. Will have to see about durability.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Loved the color and fit for my baby boy's bassinet ...
customer_reviews.text: Color faded! Loved the color and fit for my baby boy's bassinet but the color totally faded where his little head was either from spit up or head sweat. ☹️ So disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Shay Thomason

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a Guava Family Lotus Bassinet, washed up really well and fits perfectly! Will definitely be ordering another one.
customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: Soft, organic sheet for our guava lotus bassinet!
customer_reviews.text: This sheet is incredibly soft! It fits our Guava Lotus bassinet perfectly, which is what we were looking for. Much better price than the guava bassinet sheets!
customer_reviews.author: Emma R

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Soft and fir lotus bassinet perfectly. Light pink color. Came out of wash and dryer fine.
customer_reviews.author: bodiemonster

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet!
customer_reviews.text: I liked the first one so much, I bought a second one for daycare. They fit and stay put on both of the bassinet pads I put them on. Very soft and nice!
customer_reviews.author: RR

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on the naturpedic oval bassinet pad, very soft as well.
customer_reviews.author: Philly Folk

customer_reviews.title: Great sheets!
customer_reviews.text: Love these little sheets! They are very soft I. Texture and the soft colors are perfect for little ones. I have two of these and they hold up great in the wash.
customer_reviews.author: literary typist

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Baby sleeps so well on these, would not choose anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Twain J

customer_reviews.title: Great price and soft
customer_reviews.text: This worked really well on the Guava Lotus bassinet. Great price and soft!
customer_reviews.author: Heaphy29

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Glad to find an organic cotton sheet that fit my bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Alan M Mikuni

customer_reviews.title: Soft, did not shrink after washing
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these in off-white and mocha. At the very least I wanted additional sheets for the Summer Infant By Your Side Sleeper, as it only came with one. They fit that mattress very well and they fit the Naturepedic Organic Bassinet Mattress that I purchased for the Sleeper really nice and tight. I washed them both and don't see any shrinkage. Plus love the reusable/travel bag that they come in!
customer_reviews.author: cocokru

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy Mama!
customer_reviews.text: Just as pictured and arrived quickly!! Softer than we had even hoped!
customer_reviews.author: RobNAngelina

customer_reviews.title: ... for my bassinet and this was by far the best brand. The sheet is so soft and I ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple sheets for my bassinet and this was by far the best brand. The sheet is so soft and I love the color. Also a great price for a great product !
customer_reviews.author: Allison R.

customer_reviews.title: A perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: These sheets fit my bassinet perfectly and I was able to slide in a extra flat absorbent pad without any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Inacio

customer_reviews.title: fits uppababy vista
customer_reviews.text: Fits uppa baby vist bassinet. A little big but can be tucked under
customer_reviews.author: calicanuck

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sheets. The sheet fits the Chicco Lullago ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sheets. The sheet fits the Chicco Lullago Bassinet. Yayyyy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits Cariboo Basinett
customer_reviews.text: Fits my cariboo bassinet mattress well, much less expensive than the sheets sold by cariboo.
customer_reviews.author: alyssa1414

customer_reviews.title: Shrank after washing, not as thick or soft as expected
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent sheet but not as thick or soft as I expected, and I was disappointed that it seems to have shrunk after washing :(
customer_reviews.author: CookieC

customer_reviews.title: Great sheet for Babybjorn craddle
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent for BabyBjorn craddle, much more affordable too !
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit and price for organic cotton. Color is true to the picture=super cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Turnbull

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice, soft, sheets. Just a little bit small for what I bought it for.
customer_reviews.author: Jo Ann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit great for my graco travel lite pack n play.
customer_reviews.author: honeydew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The material is super soft and GREAT quality... I bought it for my baby's crib and bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very soft sheet. Fits the Nuna Sena Mini travel ...
customer_reviews.text: Very soft sheet. Fits the Nuna Sena Mini travel crib perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: BCSmith

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect. The material is very soft. I also found out that using a pillow case cover works in a pinch.
customer_reviews.author: ruth m rivera

customer_reviews.title: Great fitted sheet option for the Lotus bassinet by Guava Family
customer_reviews.text: Great fitted sheet. As others have noted, it fits the Lotus bassinet by Guava Family perfectly, and is much less expensive than the fitted sheets for sale on the Guava website. (I never ordered the sheets from Guava Family so can't compare feel or quality there.) These sheets are smooth and soft. We ordered two and have washed them both twice in a week with no signs of wear. We'll see how the hold up over the next few months.
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: Wish the sheet had a better fit...
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is soft, but it doesn't fit my naturepedic bassinet mattress (15x30). The sheet is way too small. Not sure if it shrank in the first wash, but I was bummed since I had ordered two of them. It would help if the company put measurements in the item description.
customer_reviews.author: MMFOR

customer_reviews.title: Sweet and soft
customer_reviews.text: Used it in our stroller bassinet. Lovely color. Fit was good, fabric was soft. It's tight to put on but they have to be to keep the kids safe.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy and soft sheets that I used on the ...
customer_reviews.text: Very cozy and soft sheets that I used on the Arms Reach mini co-sleeper and a Cariboo bassinet. They were a touch big, but I just made sure to secure well underneath the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: JJ_MC

customer_reviews.title: Quality is great, very soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: A little large for the Baby Bjorn Cradle. Quality is great, very soft fabric. Washes well.
customer_reviews.author: Martha Not Stewart

customer_reviews.title: just okay
customer_reviews.text: except the fact that it's organic, the fabric is thin and not very soft. i wanted to buy the sheets for the baby crib, but one for the bassinet is enough and then we will try an other brand
customer_reviews.author: Robardey Julie

customer_reviews.title: So soft.
customer_reviews.text: So soft, a little to big for my appababy bassinet, but not a big problem. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya K.

customer_reviews.title: even better than the official one
customer_reviews.text: Fits the lotus bassinet perfectly, even better than the official one! Fabric is not particularly soft but for the price and organic I'm incredibly happy with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: mb

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality, it fit and looked nice on the bassinet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just gorgeous! PERIOD....  BUY IT
customer_reviews.text: Quality, value, fit, wonderful! If you don't own one of these, then your child's nursery is not complete. This is a very good Manufacturer of baby products to go with as well if you're looking for a good quality product at a great value. A Dynamite product!
customer_reviews.author: Homeschooling Mom

customer_reviews.title: Gift on registry
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for baby shower gift by a mother-to-be who registered for all natural organic products for that special baby coming soon.
customer_reviews.author: M. W.

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Wish it fit the basinet love the color and material

product_meta.title: Kushies Baby Organic Jersey Bassinet Fitted Sheet, Grey
product_meta.description: Color:GreyKushies Organic Bassinet/Carriage Pad fitted sheets are made of soft 100% certified organic cotton jersey. They are fully elasticized for a perfect fit and sized to allow for shrinkage. The sheets are available in a variety of warm colors.
feature_bullets: 100% premium quality certified organic cotton interlock
All fitted sheets are fully elasticized for a perfect fit
Finished edges for quality and durability

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars178 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
